about_the_game:
This is a fighting game which you roll a Pencil and fight against the world's great heroes.


Roll the Pencil and when it stops, you attack the enemy according to the method displayed on the top surface of the Pencil.
You take turns rolling the Pencil and the first player to take all of the opponent's HP wins.


You can also use the accumulated power each time you roll the Pencil to unleash a powerful attack.

Trust your luck and roll the Pencil to defeat many great heroes!

Features:

-Easy to play, just select a Pencil and roll it.
-Pencils with various abilities, inhabited by the souls of monsters.
-The enemy are the world's great heroes who own special Pencils.
--Start each battle with 3 randomly selected pencils. Choose one of them and fight against the great heroes!
-The pencils will disappear once used regardless of your battle result. However, if you defeat the great heroes, you can choose a reward Pencil.
-Beat five enemies in a row.


Story:
You wake up and find yourself in a dimly lit room.
A voice came out of nowhere.

"Pick up your Pencil and fight."

The world's great heroes of the past are in front of you.
This is a battle against the great heroes using a Pencil.

Why are you here?
And will you survive?

Only the Pencil knows...
